product_name: SIGMA SPORT POWERLED EVO Front Bike Light - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With up to 900 lumens for commuting or cruising mountain bike trails in the dark, the rechargeable SIGMA SPORT POWERLED EVO Front Bike Light guides you through any terrain. Light features 4 modes: energy saving, standard, power and flashing. Depending on light level, the light can provide 3 - 5 hrs. of steady illumination; flashing mode offers 11 hrs. SIGMA SPORT POWERLED EVO Front Bike Light offers special optics that create a cone of light that is both broad and far reaching. Exposed on/off switch is easy to use, even with biking gloves. Watertight, extremely durable aluminum housing; tool-free mounting fits 22-32mm bars; horizonatally adjustable; battery level indicator light; includes helmet bracket. Closeout.
